```{mermaid}
flowchart TD
    A[Raw serum proteomics] --> B[Preprocess: log10, scale, trim]

    C --> D2[Random Forest on train\nTop k = 15]

    D2 --> E1
    D2 --> E2
    E1 --> F1[Logistic regression\nevaluate on test]
    E2 --> F2[Logistic regression\nevaluate on test]
    F1 --> G1[Report: sens, spec, acc, AUC]
    F2 --> G2[Report: sens, spec, acc, AUC]
```
